de.iss.mv2.io.sql

Class ChangeSensetiveObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • de.iss.mv2.io.sql.ChangeSensetiveObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandBuilderSettings, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Commitable

    public abstract class ChangeSensetiveObject
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, CommandBuilderSettings
    Stellt ein Objekt dar, dessen Tabellen-Felder zustandssensitiev sind.
    Author:
    singer

      • checkField

        private boolean checkField(TableField<?> field,
                           java.util.List<TableField<?>> others,
                           boolean ignorePK)
        Checks if the given field is a duplicate.
        Parameters:
        field - The field to check.
        others - A list with fields to check with.
        ignorePK - true if field to check should be ignored if it is a primary key.
        Returns:
        true if a duplicate was found or the given field is a primary key and primary keys should be ignored.
